Package range_partition

Class range_partition

java.lang.Object
range_partition.range_partition
public class range_partition
extends java.lang.Object
It partitions a GPS data collection of cows into three periods (pre-day, daytime, post-day) based on a given time file Input: files name of GPS and time data Output: three time partition files

      Parameters:

    • cleanFiles

      private void cleanFiles()
      Create or overwrite three time partition files(pre-day, daytime, post-day) and write the title

    • readGPSData

      private void readGPSData()
      Read GPS data file and write into three time partition files according to the sunrise and sunset time of a certain day, which stored in a time object

    • writeToFile

      private void writeToFile​(int type, java.lang.String line)
      Write GPS data string into belonging time partition file according to the pre-evaluated type
      Parameters:
      type - - 0(time is pre-day) 1(time is daytime) 2(time is post-day)
      line - - GPS data string
